title: IT Helpdesk Specialist
description: Helped teachers and students in the college of education with tech related issues and periodically reset Operating System and Disk Storage on Laptops.

title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed a WPF client-server application to emulate F-35 fighter jet control inputs via joystick, enabling real-time modifications to aircraft components through a TCP connection. Contributed to integrating video feeds from six optical sensors on the F-35 to enhance situational awareness and obtained security clearance for military base operations.
